title: Rosie Perez Settles In As The First Latina Co-Host On 'The View'
teaser: One month into the job on ABC's The View, Rosie Perez talks about how things are going so far. She says one of the only things about the job that's not fun is the expectations of some critics.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
